data.name: Utility.Exceptions.TimestampOutOfRange
data.value: Timestamp is out of valid range and cannot be converted to DateTime.

data.name: Utility.Exceptions.ClockMovedBackwards
data.value: System clock moved backwards by {0} milliseconds, refusing to generate IDs to prevent duplicates.

data.name: Utility.Exceptions.WorkerIdOutOfRange
data.value: Worker ID out of range, acceptable values are 0 to {0}.

data.name: Utility.Exceptions.DatacenterIdOutOfRange
data.value: Datacenter ID out of range, acceptable values are 0 to {0}.

data.name: StringCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: String cannot be null or empty.
